==Japanese==

===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|う|ちゅう|じん|yomi=o}}
{{compound|宇宙|t1=[[outer space]]|人|t2=[[person]]; [[dweller]] of|lang=ja|sort=うちゅうじん}}; literally meaning "a person from outer space"

{{ja-pron|うちゅうじん|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK,DJR|y=ko}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|うちゅうじん}}

# a [[being]] from [[outer space]]; an [[alien]]
